values.description: Short call backspread, a combination of bull call spread and short call, consists of buying a lower-strike call and selling two higher-srtike calls with the same expiry.
values.keywords: short call backspread, bull call spread, limited-reward-unlimited-risk strategy, strategy payoff, early assignment
